= Smtp Configuration

This config section convert environment variable related to smtp configuration to valid odoo CLI.

include::partial$converters/smtp.adoc[]


[[option_email_from]]
== email_from
specify the SMTP email address for sending email

TIP: Supported Odoo version from 12.0 until 19.0

The environment variable `SMTP_EMAIL_FROM` is used and expect a xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_str[str].

Odoo cli used:

* --email-from

[[option_from_filter]]
== from_filter
specify for which email address the SMTP configuration can be used

TIP: Supported Odoo version from 15.0 until 19.0

The environment variable `SMTP_EMAIL_FILTER` is used and expect a xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_str[str].

Odoo cli used:

* --from-filter

[[option_smtp_server]]
== smtp_server
specify the SMTP server for sending email

TIP: Supported Odoo version from 12.0 until 19.0

The environment variable `SMTP_HOST` is used and expect a xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_str[str].

Odoo cli used:

* --smtp

[[option_smtp_port]]
== smtp_port
specify the SMTP port

TIP: Supported Odoo version from 12.0 until 19.0

The environment variable `SMTP_PORT` is used and expect a xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_int[int].

Odoo cli used:

* --smtp-port

[[option_smtp_user]]
== smtp_user
specify the SMTP username for sending email

TIP: Supported Odoo version from 12.0 until 19.0

The environment variable `SMTP_USER` is used and expect a xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_str[str].

Odoo cli used:

* --smtp-user

[[option_smtp_password]]
== smtp_password
specify the SMTP password for sending email

TIP: Supported Odoo version from 12.0 until 19.0

The environment variable `SMTP_PASSWORD` is used and expect a xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_str[str].

Odoo cli used:

* --smtp-password

[[option_smtp_ssl]]
== smtp_ssl
if passed, SMTP connections will be encrypted with SSL (STARTTLS)

TIP: Supported Odoo version from 12.0 until 19.0

The environment variable `SMTP_SECURE` is used and expect a xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_bool[bool].

Odoo cli used:

* --smtp-ssl

[[option_smtp_ssl_certificate_filename]]
== smtp_ssl_certificate_filename


TIP: Supported Odoo version from 15.0 until 19.0

The environment variable `SMTP_SSL_CERTIFICATE_FILENAME` is used and expect a xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_bool[bool].

Odoo cli used:

* --smtp-ssl-certificate-filename

[[option_smtp_ssl_private_key_filename]]
== smtp_ssl_private_key_filename


TIP: Supported Odoo version from 15.0 until 19.0

The environment variable `SMTP_SMTP_SSL_PRIVATE_KEY_FILENAME` is used and expect a xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_bool[bool].

Odoo cli used:

* --smtp-ssl-private-key-filename
